Title: Establishes St. Patrick's day as a school holiday for all city school districts of one million or more with an Irish-American population of 7.5% or more
Summary: Establishes St. Patrick's day, March 17th, as a school holiday for all city school districts of cities of one million inhabitants or more.
LawCode: Add ยง3204-a, amd ยง3604, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing the St. Patrick's Day school holiday
